title: HTML Color Groups

metadata.description: Learn about HTML Color Groups with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Color Names Sorted by Color Groups
All modern browsers support the following 140 color names (click on a color name, or a hex value, to view the color as the background-color along with different text colors):
Click here to see the 140 colors sorted by Name
Click here to see the 140 colors sorted by HEX Value

practice_exercises.title: Practice Exercise
practice_exercises.description: Create an example that applies the concepts from this tutorial.

related_topics.title: C Common Pitfalls and How to Avoid Them

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this c feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this c feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

summary: This tutorial covers HTML Color Groups concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use HTML Color Groups effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of HTML Color Groups and how to apply it in your projects.
